title: Impeaching Donald J. Trump, President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
summary:
This resolution impeaches President Donald Trump for high crimes and misdemeanors.

The resolution sets forth one article of impeachment concerning abuse of presidential powers by usurping Congress's power to declare war.

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
